sources.title: Flop Goes the Weasel (1943)
sources.description: While Mammy is gone to catch a worm for her about-to-hatch egg, a weasel steals the egg for his breakfast. When the egg hatches, the blabbermouth chick initially mistakes the weasel for his Mammy. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/flop-goes-the-weasel-1943/

metadata.Plot: While Mammy is gone to catch a worm for her about-to-hatch egg, a weasel steals the egg for his breakfast. When the egg hatches, the blabbermouth chick initially mistakes the weasel for his Mammy.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Ruby Dandridge, Lillian Randolph
